name: ext_R4_OperationDefinition_overload
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.OperationDefinition.overload for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents OperationDefinition.overload from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/OperationDefinition|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R2.

element.short: Define overloaded variants for when  generating code
element.definition: Defines an appropriate combination of parameters to use when invoking this operation, to help code generators when generating overloaded parameter sets for this operation.
element.comment: `OperationDefinition.overload` has no related element in R2:OperationDefinition

element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. element.comment: There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.
